ABOUT ME

I'am Agung Rosyandi
Self Taught Web Developer, World Politics Enthusiast, and historical Enthusiast

I am a Graduate from the Faculty of Social Science and Political Science majors in International Relations of Universitas Padjadjaran. My interest in historical analysis on global context, foreign policy analysis, World Politics issue, and Web Development, especially Full Stack Developer. For profesional carrer I am Hard worker, target oriented, on time, and accept the critics. And also I am able to work well Individually and also in a team.

Soft Skill i Learned

Since Middle High School until now, i can't be seperated from my computer. Unfortunately my activity in my computer just for playing game or watching movie, and sometime i am experiment and modification system in my computer for better system. After realizing IT skills very important for profesional carrer, and With my basic skill and experience in computer during 15 years, so i think its very good idea switch my carrer for better skills especially in Full Stack Developer. in july 2020, my first steps to learning IT skill i buy online courses about Full Stack Web Development by Angela Yu in Udemy. I hope with my first step and As time goes by, i can reach my goal future to become profesional Software Enginner.
